Name: Suri To Go
Review Text: Suritogo in the Mosveld shopping centre serves pretty decent Surinam food (strong Indian/Hindustani influence) both for takeaway and to eat on the spot. The Roti is a good full meal for 10 euro. This is quite close to the NH Amsterdam North ... use the underpass below the road.

Name: Suri To Go
Review Text: I eat here all the time. Great food, great service, every single visit.

Name: Suri To Go
Review Text: Flat taste and too expensive for such quality

Review Text: (Translated by Google) It was funny when I was told that they themselves are not Surinamese, and also asked too much money, reason was because there is vegetables. When I walked away without buying anything, they were not really happy. …
